data.title: Largest Cities in the U.S. (2015)
data.meta_description: Top U.S. cities with population over 100,000 ranked by population with the 2014 estimate and the 2010 Census data.

Largest Cities in the U.S.

Largest Cities in the U.S. (2014)

Largest cities in the United States of America ranked by population as estimated as of July 1, 2014 by the U.S. Census Bureau. We list the top 295 cities, with population over 100,000 and show the yearly growth rate (2014 over 2013) and the data from the actual April 1, 2010 U.S. Census Survey.
